event.title: Mechanical Engineering Assignment Help
event.description:
Mechanical engineering is one of the oldest and most difficult engineering courses to date. With the advancement of technology, mechanical engineering has surely been evolved into a very passionate choice for engineering students. From the designing of cars to turbines, lifts to cranes all come under the mechanical engineering branch. The rate at which the technology is progressing it surely puts immense pressure on the students to deliver the various projects and home assignments given by institutions for teaching students the various upcoming technologies in advance. Also since every project starts with research and then comes to designing, it becomes a great burden for the students to submit those projects and assignments on time along with their regular studies. To overcome these burdens, we at My Assignment Help take pride in as our team of experts supports you in every aspect of the projects and assignments given to students. We give a high quality and efficient research and design along with automation when required to help the students achieve great results and thorough knowledge through our Mechanical Engineering Home Work Help. With collaborating with us students can now focus on their studies and leave the tiresome work for us to complete and give unmatched results.     

Thermodynamics Assignment Help

Thermodynamics is the most intensive topic of mechanical engineering courses due to the vast variety of subtopics and fields of application. A crystal clear understanding of these sub-topics is required since a minor mistake can result in a variety of difficulty in later stages of their life. Also, a huge number of questions, projects, and research papers can be given to make students understand the scope of the subject, hence resulting in next-level challenges to a student to complete and get a good result in this subject. We at My Assignment Help provide online assignment help for thermodynamics and all Engineering Assignment. The various topics of Thermodynamics Assignment Help are given below:

  1. Concepts of heat, work, energy, temperature, and pressure.
  2. Properties of pure substances
  3. Steam tables
  4. Phase diagrams and their use in thermodynamics problems
  5. First and Second Laws of Thermodynamics
  6. Carnot cycle
  7. Gas power cycles
  8. Vapour and combined power cycles
  9. Use T-s diagrams for power cycle analysis
  10. P-h diagrams in refrigeration cycle analysis
  11. Simple combustion processes
  12. Renewable energy such as solar, hydro, wind and biomass, and their use in heating and electricity generation
  13. Environmental benefits of renewable energy
